meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Don Bouchoux Lucy Kendikian-Smith Richard Kaplan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1806.

td.p: Don Bouchoux, a military analyst from Great Falls, Virginia
Lucy Kendikian-Smith, a teacher and attorney originally from Mexico City, Mexico
Richard Kaplan, a lawyer from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,202)

tr.td: THE 1940s
CYCLING
RECYCLING
COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD
SEWING
LAST NAME'S THE SAME
